mapper.update: update IPO_PUBLISHER_POSITION set PUBLISHERID = #{publisherid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALVALUE = #{totalvalue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBPOSITION = #{pubposition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALECOUNTS = #{salecounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTALCOUNTS = #{totalcounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE} where POSITIONID = #{positionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select POSITIONID, PUBLISHERID, COMMODITYID, TOTALVALUE, PUBPOSITION, SALECOUNTS, TOTALCOUNTS, STATUS, CREATER, CREATEDATE, UPDATER, UPDATEDATE from IPO_PUBLISHER_POSITION where POSITIONID = #{positionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select POSITIONID, PUBLISHERID, COMMODITYID, TOTALVALUE, PUBPOSITION, SALECOUNTS, TOTALCOUNTS, STATUS, CREATER, CREATEDATE, UPDATER, UPDATEDATE from IPO_PUBLISHER_POSITION

SELECT count(*) FROM IPO_PUBLISHER_POSITION T WHERE 1=1
and T.COMMODITYID like concat('%',concat (#{record.commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
